name: Ban
description: With this command you can ban a user from your server.

name: BanList
description: You can view a list of bans on the server.

name: Kick
description: You can kick someone from your server.

name: UnBan
description: You unban someone from your server.

name: Clear
description: You delete messages from the channel on which you execute the command.

name: Set-Prefix
description: You enter a prefix in the bot.

name: Set-Lang
description: You set a language in the bot.

name: Unlock
description: You unlock the channel on which you execute the command.

name: Lock
description: You block the channel on which you execute the command.

name: SetNick
description: You enter the nickname of a user

name: ChannelTools
description: You will open a menu in which you will find several tools to configure your channel.

name: AddRole
description: Add a role to a user

name: RemoveRole
description: You remove a role from a user
